articles.title: The pandemic could reshape the world order. Trump's chaotic strategy is accelerating US losses
articles.description: Europe outright rejected US President Donald Trump's vision of the world this week. Tensions between these historic democratic allies that have been simmering since Trump came to office three years ago have now come to a boil during the coronavirus pandemic.
